text: (nabiye!) anfal (namæti yuda pitiyedi læbunu vastun) gæna ovun obagen vimasannaha. (eyata) oba mese pavasanu: anfal allahtada, (allahge) dutayatada ayiti dæyayi. ebævin oba allahta biya vi (ehi kisi dæyak nosa`gava) oba atare niyama akarayata katayutu karanu. ættenma oba satya visvasavantayin nam, allahtada, allahge dutayatada avanata vi katayutu karanu
